channel.title: Help me with runserver plz
channel.description:
ok well if i download a source and/or client when i click on runserver or run it will either say somthing like the java is not recgonized as a batch file and stuff like that or it will pop up for a second then just disapear.this all started when i was reading the guide on how to make a server and i download oldkoscape as my source.soo then after awhile i think the enviorment thingas changed or sumthing but i cant play or run servers anymore soo if anyone knows how to fix this please oh please help me!
,truely monkey0 :o

item.title: Help me with runserver plz
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Or just set your environment variables.

This would fix this.

Read full topic
